metadata.title: Seedance 2 Video Showcases - AI Generated Video Examples
metadata.description: Explore stunning AI-generated video examples created with Seedance 2. From cinematic scenes to creative animations, see what Seedance 2 can do.

showcases.title: Seedance 2 Video Gallery
showcases.description: Explore stunning AI-generated videos created with Seedance 2. Hover to preview, click to watch full screen.

items.title: Sunset Laundry
items.description: A girl elegantly hanging laundry on a balcony at golden hour, with realistic cloth physics and natural body movements.

items.title: Urban Chase
items.description: A man sprinting through crowded city streets with dynamic camera tracking, showcasing fluid motion and crowd simulation.

items.title: Coming Home
items.description: A man walking down a hallway toward the front door, with cinematic lighting and character consistency throughout the scene.

items.title: Chinese Opera
items.description: A traditional Chinese opera performer in elaborate costume with intricate headpiece, performing graceful movements on stage.

items.title: Product Showcase
items.description: Elegant ribbon bows in multiple colors and patterns, demonstrating product photography and commercial video generation.

items.title: Elevator Scene
items.description: A tense Hitchcock-style elevator scene with dramatic camera work including orbit shots and zoom effects.

items.title: Wuxia Battle
items.description: An epic martial arts duel in an autumn forest with 3D animation style, featuring dynamic combat choreography.

image.alt: Martial arts fight in autumn forest

items.title: Supercar Reveal
items.description: A red Lamborghini in an underground parking garage with cinematic lighting, reflections, and automotive showcase style.

items.title: Angel Awakening
items.description: A fantasy scene of an ethereal angel with glowing wings before a stone angel statue, with stunning VFX and lighting.

items.title: Fashion Lookbook
items.description: A dynamic fashion shoot with beat-synced outfit changes, showcasing style transitions and model posing.

items.title: Funny Horse
items.description: A cartoon horse peeking through a blanket with a fisheye lens effect, demonstrating audio-synchronized animation.

items.title: Sunset Runner
items.description: An anime-style illustration of a young man jogging through city streets at sunset with vibrant colors.

items.title: Spy Thriller
items.description: A one-take tracking shot of a woman in a red coat walking through a busy European street in spy thriller style.

image.alt: Woman in red coat on European street

items.title: Fashion Ad
items.description: A stylish fashion advertisement with geometric backgrounds and dynamic text overlays, beat-synced editing.
